content: To the right when facing the shrine, you can spot stairs leading up past a wooden platform where a Blazebone will attack from its vantage point.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rockrest Flat'.
The content is as follows:
To the right when facing the shrine, you can spot stairs leading up past a wooden platform where a Blazebone will attack from its vantage point.
